abstract: The App Store for iPhone software is the first step in an attempt to dominate the next generation of computing.
snippet: The App Store for iPhone software is the first step in an attempt to dominate the next generation of computing.
lead_paragraph: PALO ALTO, Calif.  When Apple opens its online App Store for iPhone software on Thursday, Steven P. Jobs will be making an attempt to dominate the next generation of computing as it moves toward Internet-connected mobile devices.

headline.main: Apple’s Latest Opens a Developers’ Playground
headline.print_headline: Apple’s Latest Opens a Developers’ Playground

byline.original: By John Markoff and Laura M. Holson

abstract: It’s no secret that lots of companies are going to release applications for the iPhone. But Apple is nonetheless banning them from discussing their plans until noon Thursday.
snippet: It’s no secret that lots of companies are going to release applications for the iPhone. But Apple is nonetheless banning them from discussing their plans until noon Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s obsession for secrecy is legendary. Big projects are divided into small teams and employees are told not to fraternize with members of other groups, lest someone gain access to the bigger picture.

headline.main: Apple Imposes Gag Rule on iPhone Application Makers
